content:
That's wonderful! It's great that you're making an effort to stay in touch with your grandparents regularly. Sunday calls and sharing photos and updates are excellent ways to maintain a strong connection. It's clear that you value your relationships with them, and they likely appreciate the effort you're putting in to stay connected.

A family trip to the beach house sounds like an amazing idea! It's a perfect opportunity to create lasting memories, have quality time together, and make new experiences. The beach house setting will provide a relaxed and casual atmosphere, allowing everyone to unwind and enjoy each other's company.

Remember to plan activities and games that cater to different age groups and interests, so everyone feels included and engaged. You can also consider having a family game night, bonfire, or even a scavenger hunt to make the trip even more special.

It's great that you're thinking ahead and making an effort to prioritize family time. I'm sure your grandparents will appreciate the effort you're putting into planning a fun and memorable trip for everyone.

What do you think about planning a family tradition or ritual during the trip, like having a weekly dinner together or playing a specific game? This could help create a sense of continuity and make the trip even more special.
